column2: # AYNI SPEECH RATEI 6 KEZ BASTI- CHECK THE LAST GST
# Assuming df_long is your long-format data with 'speech_rate', 'slider_value', and 'index' columns
# Here's a function that creates a combined line and histogram plot for a given speech rate
# it is now showing the mean across all + the density seems of
# Assuming df_long is your data frame and already contains 'speech_rate' as an ordered factor
line_plot <- ggplot(df_long, aes(x = index, y = slider_value, group = interaction(id), color = as.factor(id))) +
geom_vline(aes(xintercept = mean(slider_value, na.rm = TRUE)), color = "darkblue", linetype = "dashed", size = 1) +
# Combine the plots side by side with patchwork
